creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: portrait of a young woman wearing a choker of large pearls, a blue dress with bows on the bodice and white lace netting and ribbons over the shoulders, and white lace and tiny pink and yellow flowers in her hair, with a brown squirrel wearing a collar with a silver chain attached, perched on her PR hand; painted oval around image, with grey ground
marks: Signature and Date along left edge, in light brown: [N. Dance fecit R
title: Portrait of Olive Craster
